Headline: #51 51st Temporary Reroute at 51st/Western
ShortDescription: 51 51st buses are rerouted via 51st, Western Boulevard, 47th, California, then resume their normal route on 51st, due to police activity near 51st/Western.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

#51 51st buses are temporarily rerouted in both directions via 51st, Western Boulevard, 47th, California, then resume their normal route on 51st, due to police activity near 51st/Western.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: #152 Addison Temporary Westbound Reroute near Addison Brown Line
ShortDescription: Westbound 152 Addison buses are temp. rerouted via Addison, Ashland, Irving Park, Damen & Addison, due to street blockage near Addison Brown Line station.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
How does this affect my trip?

Westbound #152 Addison buses are temporarily rerouted via Addison, Ashland, Irving Park, Damen, then resume their normal route Addison, due to street blockage near Addison Brown Line station.

Eastbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.

Headline: Loop "L" Service Delayed at Clark/Lake
ShortDescription: Loop "L" trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to a sick customer. Crews working to restore service.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Loop "L" trains are standing at Clark/Lake due to a sick customer. 

As a result of the delayed trains, Orange, Pink, Green and Purple Line Express trains will all be rerouted to the outer Loop. ALL Loop "L" riders will board and exit on the Brown Line platforms at Washington/Wells, Quincy/Wells, LaSalle/Van Buren, State/Van Buren, Adams/Wabash, Washington/Wabash, State/Lake, and Clark/Lake stations.

Crews are working to correct the problem.

At this time, also consider other service alternatives that may serve your trip, such as nearby bus routes, or using buses to other rail lines.

Personnel are working to restore service. Allow extra travel time.
